titleStmt.title: JRC-ACQUIS 31999L0048 English

Commission Directive 1999/48/EC of 21 May 1999 adapting for the second time to technical progress Council Directive 96/49/EC on the approximation of the laws of the Member States with regard to the transport of dangerous goods by rail - Text with EEA relevance

notesStmt.note: Only European Community legislation printed in the paper edition of the Official Journal of the European Union is deemed authentic.

body.head: Commission Directive 1999/48/EC of 21 May 1999 adapting for the second time to technical progress Council Directive 96/49/EC on the approximation of the laws of the Member States with regard to the transport of dangerous goods by rail - Text with EEA relevance
